image_fixtures = {'large_jpg_image': 'C:\\Users\\huawei\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\tmpulr8j2y5.jpg', 'large_png_image': 'C:\\Users\\huawei\...ata\\Local\\Temp\\tmpr1_p_bhf.txt', 'small_jpg_image': 'C:\\Users\\huawei\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\tmpgze8j4yk.jpg', ...}

    @allure.feature("用户认证模块")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("case", CASES)
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("dynamic_test_user", CASES, indirect=True)  # 关键修正：传递单个用例而非列表
    def test_user_auth(case, dynamic_test_user, image_fixtures):
        allure.story(case["name"])
        allure.title(f"{case['case_id']}: {case['name']}")
        logger.info(f"开始执行用例: {case['case_id']} - {case['name']}")
    
        # 1. 文件映射（仅文件上传用例需要）
        file_map = {
            "test_avatar.jpg": image_fixtures["small_jpg_image"],
            "large_avatar.jpg": image_fixtures["large_jpg_image"],
            "test_avatar.png": image_fixtures["small_png_image"],
            "large_avatar.png": image_fixtures["large_png_image"],
            "test_file.txt": image_fixtures["non_image_file"]
        }
    
        # 2. 确定是否使用token（基于动态用户是否存在）
        current_token = dynamic_test_user["token"] if dynamic_test_user else None
    
        # 3. 预处理请求
        request_data = preprocess_request(case, current_token, file_map)
    
        # 4. 处理验证码（仅{verify_code}场景）
        json_data = request_data.get("json", {})
        if not isinstance(json_data, dict):
            json_data = {}
            logger.warning("json_data不是字典类型，已初始化为空字典")
    
        # 处理verifyCode占位符
        if json_data.get("verifyCode") == "{verify_code}":
            email = json_data.get("email")
            assert email is not None, "注册请求中未包含email字段，无法获取验证码"
            json_data["verifyCode"] = send_and_get_verify_code(email)
            logger.info(f"为注册邮箱 {email} 填充验证码")
    
        # 处理verificationCode占位符
        if json_data.get("verificationCode") == "{verify_code}":
            email = json_data.get("securityEmail") or (dynamic_test_user["email"] if dynamic_test_user else None)
            assert email is not None, "未找到安全邮箱，无法获取验证码"
